response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what others might offer. Considering its significance to us and the benefits it would bring to you, we propose a price of $14,000 for the product. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value we place on it and the benefit it holds for you. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions.", "product_price": 14000}
